about_the_game:
The classic Indian game Carrom is now available to play online in Carrom Slam!

Carrom is most similar to 8-ball billiards to those unfamiliar with the game. Players take turns shooting the striker from their baseline attempting to pocket coins the corners of the board. The red piece, or queen, must be pocketed and covered before the game ends, and is worth a high value of points. The round ends when one team sinks all of their pieces!

  • 4+ player matches (steam friends and/or bots)

  • 6 game modes (professional, points, disc pool, blitz, sandbox, and training)

  • Customizable rules, point values, board dimensions, and striker designs

  • Interactive tutorial
